text.title: Hold a Dog and Tickle Its Toes

head.s: Hold a Dog and Tickle Its Toes

p.s: When owning a pupper and having the urge to tickle it , you want to do it properly so that your doggo does n't give you strange looks or misunderstand your intentions .
If your doge is n't ready for this kind of intimacy you might consider talking about it with them or waiting until your relationship is ready for it .

item.s: To do the Lappy Tappy , you must first get the doggo into your lap .
If your dog is smaller this step is easier to do because you can usually just pick it up .
However , If your dog is bigger you might have to lure your dog .
Here are some ways to get the dog into position :
Treats ! Find treats that your dog enjoys and tempt them by teasing or leaving a trail to your lap .
Words of endearment .
Your dog probably loves you , but if they do n't you might try just using a tone of voice that is non-threatening and saying something like , " Here puppy .
" Or " Come here precious .
If all else fails you might just have to grab the doggo and carry it to the designated spot .
Be careful when doing this because some doggies do not like to be picked up or manhandled .
Getting into position .
Getting the pupper into position is the harder part .
You need the doge to be on it 's back if possible to give you access to the little foot fingers that you wish to tickle .
Try belly rubs .
Belly rubs are a good way to get the dog to roll over in your lap .
If your dog is too big for that you might want to try tickling its toes while it 's in sitting position .
Pats .
Patting your dog starting at the chest might encourage your doggo to relax or lay down .
If your dog lays down , it might be the perfect time to tickle .
Head pets .
Head pets may relax the pupper and again make it easier to get the dog more comfortable with the idea of tickles on the feets .
Tickles ! Once your dog is in position , you can begin the procedure .
Make sure your dogger is relaxed and is n't trying to escape you .
You do n't want the pupper in question to misunderstand or feel concerned when you tickle its toes .
If your pupper is a hyper one , you might try the Hyped strike method .
To begin you must get your doggo excited .
Grab a toy and tease your doge .
Some pups only require toys to get them excited .
Make sure you playfully tease them and wink a lot .
Ask if your dog would like an adventure .
Teasing your doggo with an adventure such as going outside can quickly make any lethargic doge into a hyped one .
Try running around .
If your house is large enough you might try running around and chasing your pupper until he/she is excited enough for the tickles .
Talk to them ! Once your dog is excited and running around you should start calling their name and then running away just to be sure your dog is ready to come for tickles .
Tickles !
Now you have to catch your excited dog .
Chase them around until you manage to catch them .
Once you have the dog in your possession you can grab the foots and tickle the toes .
Every pupper loves to be pet or scratched in certain places .
For a more relaxed toe tickle , you might just try messaging the paws .
This may also get your doggo accustomed to the feeling of their paws being touched before you proceed to tickle .
Tickle ' zem .
Now that your puppo has gotten a desirable message you can proceed to tickle the toes .
If you are unsure of how to properly tickle a doggos toeses , then you need to learn .
You do n't want your dog to think of you as a weirdo or some kind of creep .
Take the paws in hand .
Make sure you have the paw in position by holding it in the palm of your hand .
Begin to rub in a vertical fashion .
Move the designated tickle finger up and down on your pup 's paw .
Rotate .
Now you may begin moving your finger(s) around the entire bottom of the paw .
You can go between the toes and even poke at the dog 's toenails .
Make sure your dog is comfortable with the situation .
If your pup is giving you strange looks you might want to stop .
Build trust with the dog by asking it personal questions and getting to know it 's preferences .
Make sure your doggo , pupper , or doge is comfortable in the situation .
